body: On the blog Permantar-2 [pt] you can follow Gonçalo Vieira's scientific journey to the Antarctic Peninsula. The Portuguese researcher - who is part of an international study about the permafrost and the consequences of climate change on it - invites all readers [pt] to send questions related to the campaign.
original_body: On the blog Permantar-2 [pt] you can follow Gonçalo Vieira's scientific journey to the Antarctic Peninsula. The Portuguese researcher - who is part of an international study about the permafrost and the consequences of climate change on it - invites all readers [pt] to send questions related to the campaign.
title: Portugal: A journey blog to Antarctica
